txt.en: Pick up a torch to burn other piles of refuse
Light fires to scare off cave-beasts at Khorroz
Khorroz can be found in M치ttugard.\n\nYou should light fires to scare off some of the cave-beasts at Khorroz.

You should light fires to scare off some of the cave-beasts at Khorroz.

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: Torches can be dropped by right clicking the induction bar.</rgb>
Burned piles of refuse to scare off cave-beasts at Khorroz.
This pile of refuse was quite flammable!

Khorroz, once the home to the largest bat population in Gundabad, has now been overtaken by deadly cave-beasts. The beasts thrive in the darkness. Perhaps there is a way to drive some of the beasts out of Khorroz?

Set fire to a large pile at Khorroz
You have lit many piles aflame at Khorroz and frightened off many cave-beasts in return. Your efforts here are sure to make M치ttugard a safer dwelling for those seeking to reclaim Gundabad.
